overview: In April 1990, the Hubble Space Telescope was launched with Discovery  Shot into space and at an altitude of 500-600 km above the  exposed to earth. The great dream of space research became reality  soon, however, a nightmare: it turned out that the main mirror  were faulty. It would take three more years for a rescue mission  was able to carry out a repair - with a breathtaking result.  This is the story of the people who made the Hubble a success.
title: 25 years of Hubble
